Mathematical Reflection

In this unit, we use proportional relationships to investigate probability and solve problems. At the end of this investigation, ask yourself:

What do you know about probability? About proportional relationships?

At this point, students can

  • find theoretical probabilities.
  • find all the outcomes of a game to make theoretical probabilities.
  • will use organized lists, tree diagrams, and multiplications to find the outcomes and the theoretical probabilities.
  • will use the theoretical probabilities to make predictions on future outcomes in playing the games.
